name: Test Purchase Orders Creation
sql: INSERT INTO Purchase_Orders (supplier_id, user_id, status, total) VALUES (1, 1, 'Pending', 100.00);
rationale: Verifies that a purchase order can be successfully created and stored in the Purchase_Orders table.

name: Test Purchase Order Items Creation
sql: INSERT INTO Purchase_Order_Items (purchase_order_id, product_id, quantity, price) VALUES (1, 1, 10, 10.00);
rationale: Checks if purchase order items can be added correctly to the Purchase_Order_Items table.

name: Test Foreign Key Constraint on Purchase Orders
sql: INSERT INTO Purchase_Orders (supplier_id, user_id, status, total) VALUES (99, 1, 'Pending', 50.00);
rationale: Ensures that inserting a purchase order with an invalid supplier_id raises a foreign key constraint error.

name: Test Foreign Key Constraint on Purchase Order Items
sql: INSERT INTO Purchase_Order_Items (purchase_order_id, product_id, quantity, price) VALUES (99, 1, 5, 15.00);
rationale: Confirms that an invalid purchase_order_id triggers a foreign key constraint error.
